entity: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
The Fantastic Flying Books of Mr. Morris Lessmore
To James Earl Jones for his legacy of consistent excellence and uncommon versatility.
To Dick Smith for his unparalleled mastery of texture, shade, form and illusion.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Academy Award of Merit)
entity: To FRANZ KRAUS, JOHANNES STEURER and WOLFGANG RIEDEL for the design and development of the ARRILASER Film Recorder.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
entity: To RADU CORLAN, ANDY JANTZEN, PETRU POP and RICHARD F. TOFTNESS for the design and engineering of the Phantom family of high-speed cameras for motion picture production.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
entity: To DR. JÜRGEN NOFFKE for the optical design and UWE WEBER for the mechanical design of the ARRI Zeiss Master Prime Lenses for motion picture photography.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
entity: To MICHAEL LEWIS, GREG MARSDEN, RAIGO ALAS and MICHAEL VELLEKOOP for the concept, design and implementation of the Pictorvision Eclipse, an electronically stabilized aerial camera platform.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
entity: To E.F. "BOB" NETTMANN for the concept and system architecture, MICHAEL SAYOVITZ for the electronic packaging and integration, BRAD FRITZEL for the electronic engineering, and FRED MILLER for the mechanical engineering of the Stab-C Classic, Super-G and Stab-C Compact stabilizing heads.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
entity: To JOHN D. LOWRY, IAN CAVÉN, IAN GODIN, KIMBALL THURSTON and TIM CONNOLLY for the development of a unique and efficient system for the reduction of noise and other artifacts, thereby providing high-quality images required by the filmmaking process.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Scientific and Engineering Award)
entity: To FUJIFILM CORPORATION, HIDEYUKI SHIRAI, DR. KATSUHISA OOZEKI and HIROSHI HIRANO for the design and development of the FUJIFILM black and white recording film ETERNA-RDS 4791 for use in the archival preservation of film and digital images.

category: SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNICAL AWARD (Technical Achievement Award)
entity: To ANDREW CLINTON and MARK ELENDT for the invention and integration of micro-voxels in the Mantra software.

category: JOHN A. BONNER MEDAL OF COMMENDATION
entity: To Jonathan Erland in appreciation for outstanding service and dedication in upholding the high standards of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences.
